name: ■ HYPNO VJ VISUAL DJ KEYBOARD ■
description:
A simple infinite Hypno VJ session Visual Generator

runs at very high resolutions and framerates

designed to work simple with a keyboard.

I created for a DJ / VJ performance at the UXR.zone

for the opening of  UXR OPTICA https://zazzle.com/store/uxrzone

Great for video and body projections

and as a screensaver :)

use your keyboard to control

1 to 9 - change color dominance

letter keys = unlock hypnotic visual patterns

f4 to exit

Super trippy optical illusions
